title: Fragments, ca. 1785
medium:
Medium: cotton.
Technique: printed by woodblock on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Mark at bottom of 'a', " MANUFACTURE DE DUBOIS PERE ET FRERES LE CLOS PAYS EN BOULEVARD NEUF No 7, RIVIERE ET PRES DE S.GOBLINS A PARIS BON TEINT" within an oval lozenge with a decorative border.
description: Design of flower and stripe in red and black on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, ca. 1785.
ca. 1785. Medium: cotton.
Technique: printed by woodblock on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-9-a,b.
